channel.title: Azure on Ruy IT Pro

item.title: Azure Fundamentals
item.description: My Experience Taking the AZ-900 Azure Fundamentals Exam One of my former colleagues mentioned that he had just earned his Azure Fundamentals certification as it was required by his employer. He described it as a simple and easy exam to pass, and he suggested I do the same. Considering I was planning to get into "the cloud" for some time, I saw this as the perfect opportunity. After procrastinating for months, I finally decided to take advantage of my CBT Nuggets subscription, kindly provided by my employer, and watched the 9-hour video series covering the exam.
